#summary Description of parameters

==General parameters==


===Obligatory parameters=== 

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *Related parameter(s)* || *See also* || 
|| `index` || Location of the Lemur/Indri index || || || || 
|| `model` || Association finding model. || `1` = Model 1 <br> `2` = Model 2 || || [Models] ||
|| `associationFile` || File with document-entity associations || || `associationFileFormat` || GeneratingAssociations || 

===Optional parameters===
|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *See also* || 
|| `associationFileFormat` || Association file format || `0` (default), `1`, `2`, or `3` || FileFormats ||  
|| `entityAliasMapping` || File defining a mapping of `EntityAlias` values to `EntityID`-s.<br>Obligatory, when associationFileFormat is set to 2 or 3. || || EntityRepresentation || 
|| `queryFileFormat` || Query file format || `0` (default), `1`, `2`, or `3` || FileFormats ||  


  * smoothingMethod
  * smoothingParam
  * assocFile
  * queryFile
  * runID
  * outputFile
  * resultNum
